{{cpp/numeric/random/seed_seq/title|param}}
{{cpp/numeric/random/seed_seq/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++11|1=
template&lt; class OutputIt &gt;
void param( OutputIt dest ) const;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Copies the stored seeds to the range beginning with {{c|dest}}. Equivalent to {{box|{{c/core|std::copy(}}{{rlpsi|/#v}}{{sep}}{{c/core|.begin(),}}{{nbspt}}{{rlpsi|/#v}}{{sep}}{{c/core|.end(), dest);}}}}.

If values of type {{tt|result_type}} are not [[cpp/iterator#Types and writability|writable]] to {{c|dest}}, the program is ill-formed.

If {{tt|OutputIt}} does not satisfy the requirements of {{named req|OutputIterator}}, the behavior is undefined.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|dest|the beginning iterator of the output range}}
{{par end}}

===Exceptions===
Only throws the exceptions thrown by the operations on {{c|dest}}.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;iterator&gt;
#include &lt;random&gt;

int main()
{
    std::seed_seq s1 = {-1, 0, 1};
    s1.param(std::ostream_iterator&lt;int&gt;(std::cout, " "));
}
|output=
-1 0 1
}}
